column4: can someone help me with my nvidia graphics? I had a radeon installed and I switched it to a geforce 5500 and when I installed the nvidia graphics recommended all I get it 2 small resolutions to choose from!

I switched graphics cards from a radeon 7000 to a geforce fx 5500 and installed the 173 recommended drivers.. Now I can only choose from 2 resolutions 640x480 and a 320 one. Does anyone know how to fix this?
Is that in the "system->preferences->display" section or "system->adimistration->nvidia x server settings?
